StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: • Around 4.8 years of experience in analytics domain in analyzing operational data and reporting to top management for decision support. • Worked on SAS/Base, SAS/Stat, SAS/Access, SAS/Graphs, SAS/SQL and SAS/Macro, Excel. • Expertise in importing, analyzing and coordinating data, generating reports, tables, listings and graphs. • Knowledge of Statistical Analysis - Correlation, Simple & Multiple Regression, Chi-Square, Analysis Of Variance, Cluster, Factor and Logistic Regression. • Optimized performance using Data Validation and Data cleaning on data using Statistical procedures like PROC FREQ, PROC MEANS, and PROC UNIVARIATE. • Experience in Ad-hoc programming and data management. • Core competency using operational data and getting inferential input to be provided for business decision support by using technical tools like SAS (Base and Advanced), SAS/SQL and SAS/MACRO. ◦ Data Analysis and Manipulation: SAS, SAS/SQL, Excel. ◦ Advanced Analytics Technique: SAS/MACRO. • Ability to understand the business problem, strategically planning and client communication. • Ability to analyze complex data and communicate and disseminate this information to lay people clearly and accurately. • Highly motivated individual with excellent organizational and interpersonal skills. • Possess strong ability to quickly adapt to new applications and platforms. • Good team member with strong analytical and communication skills.
StructuredXMLResume.Objective: Lead the roll in analytics domain to help business in better decision making, gaining competency and profitability with evidence-based insights from operational data analysis and reporting.

PositionHistory.Title: Business analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
COMPANY: Baroque Technologies Pvt. Ltd. CLIENT: Vodafone India Pvt Ltd. DURATION: Aug'14-Till Date. ROLE: Business analyst. LOCATION: Delhi.
Project:
Working with Corporate Project Management Office (PMO) for Business process Improvement for Call centre Operations across PAN India Operations (23 circles).
Responsibilities: • Fetch data from BAM for all circles, collate the fetched data and distribute to SME's for audit. • Collecting required data from different circles by calling their SPOC's for the data. • Merging of data from multiple sources and ensuring data integrity. • Collate all the audited data and analyze it on different parameters whether all circles are following the standard process. • Analyze the BAM data (i.e. Reason for customer Call, Tagging is done properly or not, TAT extension, Customer has got resolution or not, Bounce frequency, Final Churn from customer etc). • Analyze all data to see how much non adherence of process is impacting the operations and overall business. • Preparing the presentation for the Vodafone PMO form the analyzed data.
Environment: Base SAS, SAS/SQL, SAS MACROS, SAS/STAT, Excel 2010.

PositionHistory.Title: Data Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
COMPANY: Baroque Technologies Pvt. Ltd. CLIENT: Tata Teleservices Ltd. DURATION: June'13- July'14. ROLE: Data Analyst. LOCATION: Delhi.
Project:
Working with Corporate Project Management Office (PMO) for 9 circles for data analysis for product management, new acquisition and revenue enhancement strategy.
Responsibilities: • Understand the total subscriber base in TATA and their Activation, Recharge, CDR and usage data and assigned the tasks of designing and developing project specific SAS programs like producing analysis datasets, graphics and reports. • Handled the responsibilities of programming SAS and retrieving data. • Responsibilities of manipulating, transferring and managing data in SAS. • CDMA prepaid Voice, Data and VAS (CMO, INDICOM 10, Photon+ and Walky) Revenue enhancement strategy and implementation for must win circles includes: Delhi, Andhra Pradesh, Kolkata, Bihar, UPW, Rajasthan, Punjab, Haryana and Gujarat. • Product wise ARPU and RPM analysis and strategy building for new acquisition and usage revenue enhancement techniques. • Performs analysis and provides recommendations to maximize profitability and ensures business decisions are properly documented and compliant with the Company's Policy. • Analyzes business results to identify improvement opportunities, designs and executes tests to validate theories, provides business recommendations, and forecasts losses and delinquencies. • Prepare recharge and subscriber base analytics and consumer behavior analysis on new offer with customer migration strategies. • Merging of data from multiple sources and ensuring data integrity. • Daily analysis on new competitive offers in the market.
Environment: Base SAS, SAS/SQL, SAS/ACCESS, SAS/GRAPH, SAS/MACROS, SAS/ODS.

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
COMPANY: Baroque Technologies Pvt. Ltd. CLIENT: MTS Systema Shyama Teleservices Ltd. DURATION: Aug'11-May'13. ROLE: Software Engineer. LOCATION: Bangalore.
DESCRIPTION: MTS Systema Shyama Teleservices Ltd. is a privately held telecommunications company which specializes in enterprise network, telephony, and call center technology. I was involved in Data cleaning, Data manipulation, Requirement gathering, Generating Reports, Statistical analysis, Data analysis, worked on Companies customer details, Profits, Selling, Resellers, Distributors.
Responsibilities: • Extensively used procedures like PROC FREQ, PROC MEANS, PROC SORT, PROC PRINT, PROC TABULATE and PROC REPORT. • Creating permanent formatted SAS data sets and developed reports using PROC REPORT, PROC TABULATE AND DATA_NULL_ for analysis. • Used the Import and Export facilities in SAS to exchange data between SAS and Microsoft Office environments (Excel, Access). • Created Macros and developed SAS programs for Data cleaning, Validation, Analysis and Report generation using newly created as well as existing macros. • Performed Statistical Analysis with Statistical procedures and Univariate procedures from Base SAS and SAS/STAT. • Used Data _Null_ and SAS procedures such as Report, Tabulate, Freq, Means, Summary and Transpose for producing customized reports. • Performed Sorting and Merging of data and generated CRT's, tables, listings and graphs using SAS/Base, SAS/Stat and SAS/Graph, SAS/SQL. • Modified existing SAS programs and created new programs using SAS macros to improve ease and speed of modifications as well as consistency of results. • Provided all data analysis, ad-hoc and custom reporting of customer data. This involved extracting data from an Oracle database, XML files, and Flat files data used as input for SAS programs to create Excel spreadsheets, Access databases, and hard copy reports. • Used data step options like KEEP, DROP, RENAME, IF, WHERE, COALSECEC, when reading raw data files.
Environment: Base SAS, SAS/SQL, SAS/ACCESS, SAS/GRAPH, SAS/MACROS, SAS/ODS.

PositionHistory.Title: Software Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
COMPANY: Baroque Technologies Pvt. Ltd. CLIENT: Max Neeman International Pvt Ltd. (Max India Group) DURATION: July'10- July'11. ROLE: Software Engineer. LOCATION: Bangalore.
Responsibilities: • Created and maintained SAS Datasets extracted from Database. • Created Tables, Listings, Graphs and customized reports using various procedures like Proc Report, Proc Tabulate, Data _null _ and Proc Gplot. • Extensively used SET, MERGE, UPDATE statements and Proc SQL for adding new variables or observations, creating subsets or modifying datasets. • Effectively used many SAS functions like SCAN, SUBSTR, TRIM and applied strategic logic on data using INTCK, INTNX, SUM, SQRT, STD and VAR. • Performed data analysis and statistical analysis using SAS/Base, SAS Macro and other procedures like Proc freq, Proc Univariate and Proc Means. • Performed validation of SAS-generated output (tables, listings and graphs) via independent programming. • Used the SAS Macro facility to modify existing departmental macros and to replace repetitive codes.
Environment: Base SAS, SAS/SQL, SAS/ACCESS, SAS/GRAPH, SAS/MACROS, SAS/ODS.

Degree.Comments: B.E. (Telecommunication) from Sir M.V.I.T., V.T.U., Karnataka. 12th Science from B.I.E.C. Patna.

10th C.B.S.E, B.V.M, Nainital.
Place: Delhi. Date: Lalit Kumar Singh.

Qualifications.QualificationSummary:
Technical Skills:
SAS Skills: Base SAS, SAS/MACRO, SAS/SQL, SAS/STAT, SAS/GRAPH, SAS/ODS, SAS/ACCESS. SAS PROCs: Tabulate, Report, Summary, Means, Freq, Sort, Reg, Plot, Gplot, Gchart, GLM, Logistic, Summary, Format, Transpose, Contents, Import, Export, etc. Languages: SAS, SQL.
Operating Systems: Window7/2000/XP, UNIX. Office Tools: MS-OFFICE, Word, Excel, PowerPoint.

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Lalit Kumar Singh's experience appears to be concentrated in Information Technology / Database, with exposure to Marketing / Data & Analytics. Lalit Kumar Singh has 5 years of work experience, with no management experience. WARNING: The candidate's primary experience appears to be in Information Technology, but the Job Objective appears to show interest in a different area (Marketing).
